Licensing_CreateLicense

Licensing - Create license

Request
POST /api/licensing?privateKeyId
Parameters
Name Type Value Notes
*request

Criteria used to generate the License document.
*privateKeyId string

Id of the Private Key to be used to sign the License document.
Responses
Status Code Description Samples
201

Created
| Improve this Doc View Source

Licensing_GetKeys

Licensing - List all keys

Request
GET /api/licensing/key[?pageSize&continuationToken]
Parameters
Name Type Value Notes
pageSize integer

Optional number of items to return. Max value is 1000.
continuationToken string

Optional token required to page to the next set of results.
Responses
Status Code Description Samples
200

OK
Mime type: application/json 
{
  "self": {
    "href": "https://marain.io/api/licensing/key?PageSize=1000",
    "rel": "self"
  },
  "nextPage": {
    "href": null,
    "rel": null
  },
  "results": [
    {
      "friendlyName": "Marain Enterprise Client v20.11",
      "privateKeyId": "35527d72-7cd9-4dec-894d-0953e006f964",
      "publicKey": "<RSAKeyValue><Modulus>rjsCV9oiqChuIyoZuCHuQW2MSWKKqpr6zwCkOEvsCy+xHx2SzB/34TcjEzYh/Y681p4OqcVV6sp0KaQJO1TNakV7O73pkWPdch7ZljXlc9sAzmKd60zZU1sYBni/yyD7MuzD3an7ay+PRQoGcWAZTFWT+YCR1/oj8z6ppykW/Ps=</Modulus><Exponent>AQAB</Exponent></RSAKeyValue>"

Text_Classify

Text - Classify the content

Request
POST /api/text/classify
Parameters
Name Type Value Notes
*request

Contains the configuration for classification process and the payload to be processed.
Responses
Status Code Description Samples
200

OK
Mime type: application/json 
[
  {
    "classifierId": "Politics",
    "score": 0.93
  },
  {
    "classifierId": "Sport",
    "score": 0.05
  },
  {
    "classifierId": "Technology",
    "score": 0.67
